QuestData.Title: The Home of the Frostwolves
QuestData.Description: You have arrived in Frostfire Ridge. Farseer Drek'Thar can guide you from here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Drek'Thar at the crash site in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: <The shaman grins at the harsh, windblown shore.>$b$bWelcome to the home of my people, $n.
